summary: A man goes back to his hometown that is now overrun with crime and single-handedly takes justice into his own hands.
cast: Kevin Sorbo|Richard Dillard|Gail Cronauer|Dell Johnson|A.J. Buckley|Bentley Mitchum|Yvette Nipar|Haley Ramm|Jenny Shakeshaft|Todd Terry|Jerry Cotton|John S. Davies|Richard Nance|Marc Macaulay|Brad Leland|David Frye|Mike Kirton|Cord Newman|Matthew Posey|Charles Baker|Craig Erickson|Robert Paschall Jr.|Vince Davis|Grant James|Que Reed|Lance Jay|Ron Bath|Riley Chambers|Steve M. Clark|Jason Hammond|Merk Harbour|Jackson Hurst|Bruce Stewart|Zalika Thomas
title: Pisando fuerte 2
